ðŸ“– Summary: Bananas Screen Sharing is a peer-to-peer screen sharing application for Mac, Windows, and Linux. It does not require an account and uses stun, turn, and signaling servers only for initial connection establishment. Users can download releases from GitHub or install via Homebrew on macOS.
